Interface VacationService

public interface VacationService
Service interface for managing vacations.

  • Method Details

    • findVacations

      com.vacation.page.PageResponse<com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationResponse> findVacations(int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of all vacations.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (0-based)
      size - the number of records per page
      Returns:
      a paginated list of vacation responses

    • findAllVacations

      List<com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationResponse> findAllVacations()
      Retrieves all vacations without selecting any team and user.
      Returns:
      a list of all vacation responses

    • findVacationsByUserIdNoTeamSelected

      List<com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationResponse> findVacationsByUserIdNoTeamSelected(Long userId)
      Retrieves vacations for a user when no team is selected.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of vacation responses for the user

    • getVacationsByUserIdTeamSelected

      List<com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationResponse> getVacationsByUserIdTeamSelected(Long teamId, Long userId)
      Retrieves vacations for a user when a specific team is selected.
      Parameters:
      teamId - the ID of the team
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of vacation responses for the user and team

    • getAllVacationByTeamId

      List<com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationResponse> getAllVacationByTeamId(Long teamId)
      Retrieves all vacations associated with a specific team and no user selected.
      Parameters:
      teamId - the ID of the team
      Returns:
      a list of vacation responses for the team

    • saveVacation

      Long saveVacation(@Valid @Valid com.vacation.controller.vacation.VacationRequest vacationRequest)
      Saves a new vacation request.
      Parameters:
      vacationRequest - the vacation request data
      Returns:
      the ID of the saved vacation

    • deleteVacation

      void deleteVacation(Long vacationId)
      Deletes a vacation by its ID.
      Parameters:
      vacationId - the ID of the vacation to delete
